item.title: Prototyping a Recommender System for Binary Implicit Feedback Data With R and Keras
item.description: Ten years ago, the Netflix prize competition made a significant impact on recommender systems research. In the same time, such benchmark datasets, including MovieLens, are a bit misleading: in reality, implicit feedback data, or binary implicit feedback data (someone interacted with something) could be the best we can have. One to five star ratings type of continuous response data could be challenging to get or impossible to measure. Photo: One in A Million by Veronica Benavides
